body: Hi Mostapha, Thank you for all the help. The views are parallel when I use the "Ladybug_View from sun component", I guess it makes sense that the view from the sun is set as a parallel view, as the sun can be considered to be infinitely far away. However, I am trying to make this work in my script using the "Ladybug_Set the view" component to set a normal view of my model. Even though I have an example file I don't really understand how the "save views" component works and what I need to connect as imput.  Attached is my file.[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Ytz*1w0-YzDUpDFAHbUNynimukbawf*fNy598vw7Ke9SWDa7eJRiYUy4hSTrVuGznqQ9sFdNUrOzXQ10vTdqyB18heRjRerg/Capture.JPG)
